name: Sarah EVOLI, Petitioner, v. Karl ROSENFELD, M.D., Lewis S. Sharps, M.D., Paoli Memorial Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents

parties: Sarah EVOLI, Petitioner, v. Karl ROSENFELD, M.D., Lewis S. Sharps, M.D., Paoli Memorial Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. This matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings in accordance with this Court’s recent decision in Cheeseman v. Lethal Exterminator, Inc., 549 Pa. 200, 701 A.2d 156 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence G. Metzger, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
702 A.2d 359
Sarah EVOLI, Petitioner, v. Karl ROSENFELD, M.D., Lewis S. Sharps, M.D., Paoli Memorial Hospital and Acromed, Inc., Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 29, 1997.
Lawrence G. Metzger, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
